C1 a type of small bean grown in large amounts as food for people and animals: Most of the world's soya is fed to livestock. Soya is a great source of magnesium, so try using soya yoghurt or milk in smoothies, milk puddings or porridge. Add the soya chunks and fry for ten minutes. See also
